Package com.elmenus.task.drones.service

Class DroneService

java.lang.Object
com.elmenus.task.drones.service.DroneService
@Service public class DroneService extends Object
Service class for managing drones, including registration, loading medications, state changes, and battery level checks.

  • Method Details

    • registerDrone

      @Transactional public Optional<DroneDTO> registerDrone(DroneDTO droneDTO)
      Registers a new drone.
      Parameters:
      droneDTO - The DTO representing the drone to be registered.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the registered drone as a DTO.

    • loadDroneWithMedications

      @Transactional public Optional<DroneDTO> loadDroneWithMedications(String serialNumber, Set<MedicationDTO> medications)
      Loads a drone with medications.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the drone to be loaded.
      medications - The set of medications to be loaded onto the drone.
      Returns:
      An optional DroneDTO containing the loaded drone as a DTO.

      Returns:

    • checkBatteryLevels

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=60000L) public void checkBatteryLevels()
      Scheduled task to check battery levels of drones.

    • changeDroneState

      public Optional<DroneDTO> changeDroneState(String serialNumber, DroneState newState)
      Changes the state of a drone.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the drone.
      newState - The new state to set for the drone.
      Returns:
      An optional DroneDTO containing the updated drone as a DTO.

    • getAuditLogEvents

      public List<AuditLog> getAuditLogEvents()
      Retrieves a list of audit log events.
      Returns:
      A list of AuditLog entities representing audit log events.

    • changeBatteryCapacity

      public Optional<DroneDTO> changeBatteryCapacity(String serialNumber, int newBatteryCapacity)
      Changes the battery capacity of a drone identified by its serial number.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the drone.
      newBatteryCapacity - The new battery capacity to set for the drone.
      Returns:
      A DroneDTO representing the updated state of the drone.
      Throws:
      BatteryHighException - If the new battery capacity would exceed 100 percent.
